languages.text:
Вы упаковали важную экипировку в груз — из него невозможно надеть оружие или снаряжение на персонажа!
Переложите оружие из груза обратно в инвентарь и экипируйте его — оно пригодится на данном этапе игры. Позже грузы пригодятся вам для обмена с торговцами.

You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.
languages.original_text:
Вы упаковали важную экипировку в груз — из него невозможно надеть оружие или снаряжение на персонажа!
Переложите оружие из груза обратно в инвентарь и экипируйте его — оно пригодится на данном этапе игры. Позже грузы пригодятся вам для обмена с торговцами.

traits.locale_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

languages.text:
Has recogido un objeto de equipo importante como carga. ¡Los personajes no pueden equipar objetos de carga!
Transfiere el arma desde tu carga a tu inventario y equípala. A estas alturas del juego, la necesitarás. Más adelante, podrás usar la carga para comerciar con mercaderes.
languages.original_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

traits.locale_text:
Has recogido un objeto de equipo importante como carga. ¡Los personajes no pueden equipar objetos de carga!
Transfiere el arma desde tu carga a tu inventario y equípala. A estas alturas del juego, la necesitarás. Más adelante, podrás usar la carga para comerciar con mercaderes.

languages.text:
あなたは重要な装備を貨物として積み込んでいる。キャラクターは船の貨物からアイテムを装備することはできない！
武器を貨物からインベントリに戻して装備しよう。装備はゲームのこの段階で必要になる。後に、貨物を使って商人と取り引きできるようになる。
languages.original_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

traits.locale_text:
あなたは重要な装備を貨物として積み込んでいる。キャラクターは船の貨物からアイテムを装備することはできない！
武器を貨物からインベントリに戻して装備する。ゲームのこの段階で必要になる。後で、貨物を使って商人と取り引きできるようになる。

languages.text:
您已经将一件重要装备放在了货舱里。请注意，您的角色无法装备货舱中的物品！
请将武器拿出货舱，放回您的物品栏中，把它装备在身上。游戏的当前阶段需要这件武器。在这之后，您可以利用货舱与商人进行交易。
languages.original_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

traits.locale_text:
您已经将一件重要装备放在了货舱里。请注意，您的角色无法装备货舱中的物品！
请将武器拿出货舱，放回您的物品栏中，把它装备在身上。游戏的当前阶段需要这件武器。在这之后，您可以利用货舱与商人进行交易。

languages.text:
Du hast einen wichtigen Ausrüstungsgegenstand als Fracht verstaut – Charaktere können keine Frachtobjekte ausrüsten!
Verschiebe die Waffe aus der Fracht in dein Inventar und rüste sie aus – du wirst sie zu diesem Zeitpunkt im Spiels brauchen. Später kannst du Fracht nutzen, um mit Händlern Waren zu tauschen.
languages.original_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast einen wichtigen Ausrüstungsgegenstand als Fracht verstaut – Charaktere können keine Gegenstände der Schiffsfracht ausrüsten!
Übertrage die Waffe aus der Fracht zurück in dein Inventar und rüste sie aus – du wirst sie zu diesem Zeitpunkt im Spiels brauchen. Später kannst du Fracht nutzen, um mit Händlern Waren zu tauschen.

languages.text:
Vous avez placé un précieux équipement dans votre cargaison. Les personnages ne peuvent pas utiliser les objets situés dans la cargaison du vaisseau !
Transférez l'arme de la cargaison vers votre inventaire pour pouvoir l'utiliser, car vous en aurez besoin à ce stade du jeu. Plus tard, vous pourrez utiliser la cargaison pour commercer avec les marchands.
languages.original_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez placé un précieux équipement dans la cargaison. Les personnages ne peuvent pas utiliser les objets situés dans la cargaison du vaisseau !
Transférez l'arme de la cargaison vers votre inventaire pour pouvoir l’utiliser, car vous en aurez besoin à ce stade du jeu. Plus tard, vous pourrez utiliser la cargaison pour commercer avec les marchands.

languages.text:
Önemli bir ekipman parçasını kargo olarak paketledin. Karakterler, geminin kargosunda bulunan eşyaları kuşanamazlar!
Silahı kargo bölümünden envantere geri aktarıp kuşan çünkü oyunun bu aşamasında ona ihtiyacın olacak. Daha sonra kargoları tüccarlarla ticaret yapmak için kullanabileceksin.
languages.original_text:
You have packed an important piece of equipment as cargo — characters cannot equip items from the ship's cargo!
Transfer the weapon from cargo back to your inventory and equip it — you will need it at this stage of the game. Later on, you will be able to use cargo to trade with merchants.
